name: Trash Simulator
description:
" Out of Control " GMTK 2020

Trash simulator let you embrace the life of a cube that constantly try to manage is trash problem. Where the heck does all that trash appear everywhere out of thin air ? The cat hair and poop are understandable, but the trash bags ? Is this place haunted ? Is there some hidden roomates in the house ?

  

Totally not inspired by the pile of trash that was in the entry way at begining of the jam.

  

I'm currently learning godot and this is the first jam I actually completed ! 

  

Features implemented :

  • Trash magically appear everywhere
  • You can change room but door aren't always logical
  • Walking cats that does nothing beside distracting you with their cuteness - that is if my sprite can be considered cute.
  • Basic music loop that doesn't really fit (but time was against me)
  • Dunk trash in the bin
  • Score and game over

Features not implemented - SAD :

  • Cat intercation : poop and messing with trash bag
  • Cat require attention - if given, don't raid the trash bags as often
  • different type / size of trash 
  • actual way to win (sorry)
  • make an actual ui that does not look like the trash the game is about
  • the house plant and decoration
  • difficulty increase with time
  • .... wayyyyy to much idea in this list ......
